mdRecord.dcterms:title: Kargopol and Ustyug / compiled at the Royal Geographical Society under the direction of the Geographical Section General Staff ; drawn and printed by the Ordnance Survey in 1917
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Great Britain. Ordnance Survey.
Ordnance Society (Great Britain)
Royal Geographical Society (Great Britain)
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 47 x 69 cm. on sheet 64 x 76 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Europe Scale 1:1,000,000" in margin at upper left corner.
Covers portions of the Arkhangelsk and Vologoda Oblast regions of northwestern Russia.
Includes, at bottom of sheet: References (legend); Index to adjoining sheets; Bar scale; Authorities; List of "Agents for the sale of maps ..."; Index to boundaries.
"(North P. 37 & 38)" printed in upper right margin and "G.S. G.S. No. 2758" in lower left margin.
"Plus--50 per cent" stamped in bottom margin.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: World War, 1914-1918--Russia--Maps.
Kargopolʹ (Russia)--Maps.
Velikiĭ Usti͡ug (Russia)--Maps.
Arkhangelʹskai͡a oblastʹ (Russia)--Maps.
Vologodskai͡a oblastʹ (Russia)--Maps.
